description: PIMS 1277 CC FP - Promoting the Use of Renewable Energy Resources for Local Energy Supply

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: Remove key barriers to the increased utilization of renewable energy for local energy supply, through (i) addressing the legal and regulatory barriers in order to provide fair and competitive access to the market for renewable energy producers, to ensure the collection of payments and to encourage investments into renewable energy; ii) by introducing and leveraging financing for a pilot renewable energy fund/credit line so as to overcome the key financial barriers in Georgia, and iii) by addressing the existing public awareness and capacity barriers so as to provide a basis for the general development and  implementation of renewable energy projects.
subproject.title: PIMS 1277 CC FP:Renewable Ener

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Remove key barriers to the increased utilization of renewable energy for local energy supply, through (i) addressing the legal and regulatory barriers in order to provide fair and competitive access to the market for renewable energy producers, to ensure the collection of payments and to encourage investments into renewable energy; ii) by introducing and leveraging financing for a pilot renewable energy fund/credit line so as to overcome the key financial barriers in Georgia, and iii) by addressing the existing public awareness and capacity barriers so as to provide a basis for the general development and  implementation of renewable energy projects.
subproject.title: PIMS 1277 CC FP:Renewable Ener

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: Promotion the use of small hydropower resources in Georgia and raising awareness and building capacities in local communities to develop and use these resources based on sustainable natural resources management practices.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Small HPPs at Community Level
